sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Download the zip file.
  2. Extract the zip file in /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Go to “Appearance -> Widgets”
  5. Add the widget to your sidebar
  6. Enjoy!
  7. Please rate my plugin to show your gratitude. ЁЯША
sections.faq: The best way to contact me is through the support forums. You can also email me at thavapalannilavan@gmail.com

short_description: A simple widget to display a random Quote of Honourable Leader of TamilEelam and its explanation.
